objective: Fix the page generation blocker so pages flow through the pipeline correctly

stories.description: As a developer, I can identify where the pages array is getting lost in the generation pipeline so that I can fix the root cause
acceptanceCriteria: Document the flow of pages array through the codebase
Identify the exact file/function where pages stops being passed

stories.description: As a developer, I can fix the pages array flow so that pages are included in generated projects
acceptanceCriteria: Pages array flows from input to output
Generated projects include all specified pages
No console errors related to missing pages

stories.description: As a developer, I can verify the fix works end-to-end so that we can ship confidently
acceptanceCriteria: Run a test generation with 3+ pages
Verify all pages appear in output
